## Warm up

-   Turn to the person next to you and tell them about your research/work in once sentence.

```{r}
countdown::countdown(2)
```

::: notes
What do they know? Technical terms? Knowing when to stop talking
:::

## Explaining statistical concepts

Choose a statistical concept and try and explain it to your neighbour

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
-   p-value
-   Hypothesis test
-   Confidence interval
-   Significance
-   Sample
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
-   Prior distribution
-   Bayes' Theorem
-   Median
-   Variance
-   Linear regression
:::
:::

```{r}
countdown::countdown(2)
```

## Explaining statistical concepts

-   Use common language

-   Analogies can be useful
